metadata.Title: CVE-2020-22016 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: A heap-based Buffer Overflow vulnerability in FFmpeg 4.2 at libavcodec/get_bits.h when writing .mov files, which might lead to memory corruption and other potential consequences.

criterions.comment: ffmpeg: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
